Meetings in this file are:

  • How to apply for a PCG Bursary
  • PCG Sessions at BCA Annual Meeting in April 2000

Physical Crystallography Group Sessions

BCA Spring Meeting April 3 - 6 2000 (Heriot-Watt)

  1. Tuesday 4 April 2000, 14.00 - PCG / CCG Oral Poster Session
    This session will also include a lecture from the 2000 Philips Prize winner (to be announced during the meeting)
  2. Wednesday 5 April 2000, 09.00 - 12.30   Disordered Materials
    Programme:
    • 09:00 Dr. R.W Whitworth (Birmingham University) "Order and disorder in ices"
    • 09:30 Dr. C. Lobban, Prof. W.F. Kuhs (Göttingen University) & Prof. J.L. Finney (UCL) "What drives partial ordering in ices?"
    • 10:00 Dr. R.J. Papoular (Saclay, France) "Imaging disordered protons using ME techniques"
    • 10:30 COFFEE
    • 11:00 Dr. S.T. Bramwell (UCL) "Spin ices"
    • 11:30 Prof. A. Harrison (Edinburgh University) "Magnetic frustration"
    • 12:00 Dr. R. Stewart (ILL Grenoble, France) "Disordered magnetic systems"

Contact: PCG Secretary Chick Wilson (C.C.Wilson@rl.ac.uk)

Chick Wilson
PCG Secretary
August 1999
